attributes.action: to teach road users to respect hgv drivers
attributes.additional_details: to make it compulsary to teach new drivers to respect the profesinal road user. ie why not to cut in that gap coming up to roundabouts in front of hgv. why not to speed up when we flash you out of slip rd leaving us in outside lane. and why we somtimes have to take a little bit of your lane on corners/roundabouts-its ok doris we can see you!!
